Title: Amends the effectiveness of provisions related to permitting a close friend to make an anatomical gift of a decedent's body
Summary: Amends the effectiveness of provisions related to permitting a close friend to make an anatomical gift of a decedent's body.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Chap of 2025 (as proposed in S.3360 & A.1395)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend a chapter of the laws of 2025 amending the public health law relating to permitting a close friend to make an anatomical gift of a decedent's body, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 3360 and A. 1395, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
